Report.Query: SELECT ROWNUM AS Sequence, parent_org_id AS ParentOrgId, org_id AS OrgId, org_group AS OrgGroup, route_id AS RouteId, plan_name AS PlanName, class_number AS ClassNumber, class_type AS ClassType, train_number AS TrainNumber, fst_station AS FstStation, lst_station AS LstStation, start_time AS StartTime, end_time AS EndTime, operation_mileage AS OperationMileage, operation_time AS OperationTime, row_number() over (order by ROWNUM) as RowNumber, count(*) over () as TotalItems FROM rpt_busiquery_plan
